original_text: When thou art come into the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee, thou shalt not learn to do after the abominations of those nations.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에 들어가거든 너는 그 민족들의 가증한 행위를 본받지 말 것이니

sentences.original_text: When thou art come into the land
which the Lord thy God giveth thee
thou shalt not learn to do
after the abominations of those nations
